backend/main.mo: Defines a Book type, stores a list of Honeydew textbook entries, and exposes a query to return them.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files including styles, routing, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with landing and reader routes wrapped in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Displays a book card with normalized cover image paths and a button routing to the reader page.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides global page layout with header, footer, and content wrapper.
frontend/src/constants/books.ts: Empty constants file intended for book‑related configuration.
Exports a structured chapter index for the Honeydew textbook with titles and starting pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Fetches the book list from the backend actor with controlled retry and refetch behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind stylesheet defining a warm educational OKLCH palette and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays a hero section and a list of available books with loading/error states and basic feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/ReaderPage.tsx: Loads and displays a selected book’s PDF with chapter navigation, search, and iframe load-state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests related to adding missing Honeydew PDF assets.
